channel.title: 彭博-市场

item.title: 中国已派遣一名高级外交官前往基辅，寻求政治解决战争。但在北京内部，中国似乎对乌克兰外交官冷眼相待
item.description:
China has sent a high-ranking diplomat to Kyiv to seek a political settlement to the war. But within Beijing, it appears to be giving Ukrainian diplomats the cold shoulder https://t.co/mdlGhy2dWB

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 路透社等媒体报道，中国将今年的经济增长目标定为 5%左右
item.description:
China set its economic growth target for this year at around 5%, Reuters and other media reported https://t.co/9E4QBh2Acp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 东京的物价增长在 2 月份重新超过了日本央行的目标，这一增长支持了央行自 2007 年以来首次加息的理由
item.description:
Price growth in Tokyo surged back above the Bank of Japan’s target in February, a jump that supports the case for the central bank’s first interest rate hike since 2007 https://t.co/TKRlr0GNOL

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 铁矿石期货从上周五创下的 10 月份以来最低收盘价反弹，投资者正密切关注本周中国国家立法机关年度会议发出的任何需求信号。
item.description:
Iron ore futures rebound from Friday’s lowest close since October, as investors braced for any demand signals from this week’s annual meeting of China’s national legislature https://t.co/d0TbiZHq1P

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 中国一年一度最重要的政治活动--全国人民代表大会今天拉开帷幕。敬请收听我们全新的《彭博中国秀》（Bloomberg：中国秀》（平日上午 9 时至 11 时），我们将为您带来有关世界第二大经济体的独特见解
item.description:
China’s most significant annual political event of the year, National People’s Congress kicks off today.

Tune into our brand new Bloomberg: The China Show (weekdays from 9-11 a.m.) as we bring you unique insight into the world's second-biggest economy https://t.co/tv04xX9DX2 pic.twitter.com/IZEKhrYyTL

— Bloomberg TV (@BloombergTV) March 4, 2024

item.title: 全副武装的黑帮袭击了海地最大的两所监狱，暴力活动席卷首都，随后海地宣布进入紧急状态并实施夜间宵禁
item.description:
Haiti declared a state of emergency and is imposing a nighttime curfew after heavily armed gangs raided the country’s two biggest prisons and violence gripped the capital https://t.co/bJH4EXf9c9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: #5Things：华尔街对美股是否正在成为泡沫意见不一。国债收益率持续走高。中国政府正准备概述其经济增长目标。以下是市场动向。
item.description:
#5Things: Wall Street can’t agree if US stocks are becoming a bubble or not. Treasury yields have been moving higher. China’s government is preparing to outline its growth target. Here’s what’s moving markets. https://t.co/R348S4a1vW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 比特币最大的企业持有者微策略公司（MicroStrategy）建议通过出售 6 亿美元的可转换优先票据来增加其对最大加密货币的持有量
item.description:
MicroStrategy, the largest corporate holder of Bitcoin, proposed increasing its cache of the largest cryptocurrency through the sale of $600 million in convertible senior notes https://t.co/82S7TiFfbK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 越南房地产大亨张美兰（Truong My Lan）耗资 120 亿美元的欺诈案即将开庭审理，政府正在社会各界大力开展反腐运动
item.description:
The $12 billion fraud trial of Vietnamese real estate tycoon Truong My Lan is set to begin as the government presses its anti-corruption campaign across all sectors of society https://t.co/CegtvtSxIs

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）今天在最高法院获得了喘息机会，但对于特朗普重返白宫的竞选活动来说，最高法院最重要的裁决还在后面
item.description:
Donald Trump caught a break today at the Supreme Court, but the high court’s most consequential decision for Trump’s campaign to return to the White House is yet to come https://t.co/ZpTAuBxL3Z

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 法国与波兰和爱沙尼亚一道呼吁欧盟为国防项目筹集 "具体 "资金
item.description:
France joins Poland and Estonia in calling on the EU to mobilize "concrete" funding for defense programs https://t.co/ja2OexAXNl

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole）将其企业和投资银行的奖金池提高了 10%以上，因为该部门去年在许多竞争对手收入疲软的趋势中逆势而上。
item.description:
Credit Agricole increased the bonus pool for its corporate and investment bank by more than 10% after the unit bucked a trend of weaker revenue at many of its rivals last year https://t.co/HPFiakfvaN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 芝加哥市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）正在着手改造市中心的空置楼宇，初步估计耗资 10 亿美元，以应对商业地产危机，因为商业地产的销售价格已经下降了 50%以上。
item.description:
Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson is proceeding with a revamp of empty downtown buildings initially estimated at $1 billion in an effort to counter a commercial real estate crisis that’s cut sale prices by more than 50%. https://t.co/jG4FwC7GWj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 一艘悬挂利比里亚国旗的集装箱船在也门附近的亚丁湾发生爆炸，船上船员正在灭火
item.description:
The crew of a Liberia-flagged container ship was tackling a fire after their vessel suffered an explosion in the Gulf of Aden near Yemen https://t.co/9oJgaOIs3n

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 彭博社政府记者乔-梅耶斯（Joe Mayes）告诉《城市》杂志，如果保守党想要赢得大选，本周的预算案必须成为 "杀手时刻"。
item.description:

item.title: 一组经济学家认为，瑞士应抓住瑞士央行行长托马斯-乔丹离任的机会，对央行进行改革
item.description:

item.title: 市场参与者一直专注于判断美联储何时以及在多大程度上放缓资产负债表的松绑，却没有考虑到另一个问题
item.description:
Market participants have been so focused on determining when and how much the Fed will slow its balance-sheet unwind that they haven’t considered another wrinkle https://t.co/VzDwvo0ZEv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024
